portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.machinePedicure.title: Machine pedicure
portfolio.machinePedicure.subtitle: Most modern machine pedicure in Předním Výtoňi 256
portfolio.machinePedicure.description1: Machine pedicure is a modern and gentle method of foot treatment that uses special rotary cutters with diamond and ceramic attachments. This method is suitable for all age groups and offers many advantages over classic pedicure.
portfolio.machinePedicure.description2: Our pedicure is also suitable for diabetics and people with vascular problems. All tools are sterilized after each use in a MELAG device, which guarantees 100% sterility. For your maximum safety, we use exclusively disposable files and cutters.
portfolio.machinePedicure.nailSpoons.des: Gentle cleaning and treatment of nail beds using special attachments.
portfolio.machinePedicure.deepAbrasion.p: Removal of calloused skin from heels and feet
portfolio.machinePedicure.nailTapping.po: Gentle shortening and shaping of nails
Removal of hangnails and rough edges
portfolio.machinePedicure.benefits.title: Benefits of machine pedicure
portfolio.machinePedicure.recommendedFor: Everyone who wants beautiful and healthy feet
portfolio.manicure.title: Manicure with nail nourishment
portfolio.manicure.subtitle: Complete manicure with nail nourishment and cuticle treatment
portfolio.manicure.description1: Our manicure focuses not only on the aesthetic appearance of nails, but primarily on their health and strength. We use high-quality products that nourish and strengthen nails.
portfolio.manicure.description2: Each treatment includes hand bath, cuticle pushing and treatment, nail shaping, gentle polishing, hand massage and final nourishing care.
portfolio.manicure.pShine.title: P-Shine nail treatment
portfolio.manicure.pShine.description1: The revolutionary P-Shine nail treatment is the ideal choice for those who want beautiful and healthy nails without polish. This method uses a special polishing paste containing beeswax and natural oils, which smooths the nail surface and gives it a natural shine.
portfolio.manicure.pShine.description2: P-Shine treatment is suitable for all nail types and its effect lasts up to 14 days. Nails are stronger, more resistant and have a healthy appearance after treatment.
portfolio.manicure.pShine.benefits.title: Benefits of P-Shine treatment
portfolio.manicure.pShine.benefits.point: Suitable even for brittle and splitting nails
Gentle on nature and your nails
portfolio.manicure.pShine.warning: Warning: Regular use of classic nail polishes may damage the nail plate. P-Shine treatment, on the other hand, nourishes and strengthens nails.
portfolio.manicure.afterPShine.title: After P-Shine treatment
portfolio.manicure.afterPShine.descripti: After P-Shine treatment, we recommend wearing gloves during housework and avoiding long stays in water. To prolong the treatment effect, we recommend using nourishing oils for nails and cuticles.
To achieve optimal results, we recommend repeating the treatment every 2-3 weeks.
portfolio.luxuryCosmetics.title: Luxury cosmetics for body and soul
portfolio.luxuryCosmetics.description: Cosmetic skin treatment has long ceased to be just a matter for women. Today, young people with problematic skin very often seek cosmetic treatments, but men's interest has also grown in recent years. They too can now appreciate painless and very effective cosmetic treatments.
portfolio.luxuryCosmetics.ultrasonicSpat: The professional ultrasonic skin cleaner is a very popular tool in many cosmetic salons. It uses the principle of ultrasonic therapy and peeling for skin cleansing, which will be protected from aging, will be clear, healthy and elastic!
portfolio.luxuryCosmetics.chemicalPeel.d: The entire process is initiated by A-H-A acids and completed by P-H-A acids. Due to the very small molecular structure, alpha-hydroxy acids penetrate the skin faster and fulfill their basic exfoliation function. Larger P-H-A molecules are slower but more effective and intensify and complete the action of A-H-A acids. The result is a complete, deep and long-lasting cosmetic treatment. Your skin will be smoother, more radiant, younger, softer and cleaner without any blemishes. Suitable for all skin types, especially oily, prematurely aging skin, skin with wrinkles and pigmentation spots. Excellent for impure skin and inflamed acne.
portfolio.luxuryCosmetics.galvanicIron.d: It is an effective way to rejuvenate the skin without undergoing surgical procedures. It smooths wrinkles, tightens facial contours, reduces double chin, reduces dark circles under the eyes, deeply cleanses and regenerates the skin, opens clogged pores, activates lymph and cell division, quickly heals the skin, e.g. after acne. Wrinkle smoothing takes only a few minutes and the result is visible after the first treatment.
portfolio.luxuryCosmetics.biostimulating: Laser is light with specific properties and light is of fundamental importance for living cells. Laser light stimulates the energy metabolism of the cell. This phenomenon is most evident in the acceleration and healing of wounds. Laser energy is absorbed in tissue through cells, then converted in individual cells from light energy to cellular energy. At the same time, during the passage of light, the permeability of cell membranes increases, which leads to their better nutrition, improved functioning and faster division.
portfolio.luxuryCosmetics.suitableFor.co: acne, cold sores, wrinkles, after depilation, healing of nail beds, after permanent makeup, acne scars, scars, stretch marks, pigmentation disorders.
portfolio.massage.title: Massages
portfolio.massage.subtitle: Relaxation, Anti-stress, Chocolate
portfolio.massage.relaxing.title: Relaxation
portfolio.massage.relaxing.description: It is designed for relaxation, rest, quick recovery of new strength and overall harmonization of body and spirit. It has a beneficial effect on the entire organism, relieves pain in the spine, joints and muscles. It stimulates blood circulation and has a positive effect on the nervous system.
portfolio.massage.relaxing.recommendatio: We recommend warming up in the infrared sauna for 10-15 minutes. Muscles warm up and respond very well to relaxation massage and cupping.
portfolio.massage.combinedCupping.title: Combined massage with cupping
portfolio.massage.combinedCupping.descri: Applying the cup to the skin and creating an appropriate underpressure. The skin is drawn into the cup and at the application site there is a significant blood flow due to the effect. This leads to improved blood flow and stimulation of subcutaneous capillaries, which accelerates metabolism and positively affects the removal of toxic substances from the body that settle in stiffened muscles. This creates a significant relaxation of muscles and blockages.
Cups affect blood circulation, nerve endings - stimulation of acupuncture points.
Targeted removal of pain and problems with the musculoskeletal system.
portfolio.massage.combinedCupping.recomm: We recommend warming up in the infrared sauna for 10-15 minutes. Muscles warm up and respond very well to relaxation massage and cupping.
portfolio.massage.chocolate.title: Chocolate massage
portfolio.massage.chocolate.description1: It is one of the most relaxing and sensual massages. Sweet luxury, experience and relaxation. You will enjoy all of this with every sense of your body, which will boost your good mood.
portfolio.massage.chocolate.description2: It is very similar to a relaxation massage with the difference of caring for your skin with chocolate. You will perceive the chocolate scent all day long.
portfolio.massage.manualLymphaticDrainag: A gentle massage technique that stimulates the lymphatic system and helps with the drainage of excess fluid and toxins from the body. Ideal for swelling, cellulite and detoxification of the organism.
portfolio.massage.contraindications.desc: Massages are not suitable for people with the following health problems:
portfolio.massage.contraindications.item: Pregnancy (in the first trimester and in high-risk pregnancy)
Recently undergone surgeries (consultation with a doctor required)
portfolio.massage.contraindications.note: If you have any doubts about the suitability of a massage, always consult your doctor in advance.
sluzby.masaz.klasicka.description: Classic Massage is a massage that is performed with hands up to the body. It is suitable for relaxation, rest, quick recovery of new strength and overall harmonization of body and spirit. It has a positive effect on the entire organism, relieves pain in the spine, joints and muscles. It stimulates blood circulation and has a positive effect on the nervous system.
